# BBXHR

A custom implementation of XMLHttpRequest that uses the BBXHR plugin.

<a name="package-information"></a>
## Package information
| Parameter              | Value                    |
|:-----------------------|:-------------------------|
| Name                   | @backbase/bbxhr          |
| Version                | 1.0.0-rc.71              |


<a name="package-content-size"></a>
## Content size
| File                   | Size                     |
|:-----------------------|:-------------------------|
| es5/bbxhr.js           | 64.39 kB                 |
| es2017/bbxhr.js        | 53.99 kB                 |
